name: Divya
greetingText: Or should I say DD or little wrestler or CJ or little one or something new ? :P
wishText: You're an amazingly nice person, wishing you the absolute best DD. Always keep smiling and have fun today!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you divya devi!! Yay! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. And come hug me later today.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
